dmca.title: [EV1-C2098556E] Copyrights infraction
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright. Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Sunday, December 10, 2006 11:43 AM To: Copyright Subject: [EV1-C2098556E] Copyrights infraction From: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: [EV1-C2098556E] Copyrights infraction Reference: [EV1-C2098556E] For your review. -- Regards, Abuse Department The Planet - EV1Servers http://theplanet.com/legal/index.html http://ev1servers.net/About/aup.aspx http://ev1servers.net/About/tos.aspx ==== Original Message ==== 1. Copyrights infraction Added by system at Sunday, Dec 10 2006 05:38 pm X-MailFrom: karol.pawlak@netcarshow.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [70.87.6.111] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Sun Dec 10 17:38:19 2006 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Sun, 10 Dec 2006 17:38:03 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Sun, 10 Dec 2006 17:38:03 -0600 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from karol.pawlak@netcarshow.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1GtYF9-0002LH-Lg for abuse@theplanet.com; Sun, 10 Dec 2006 17:38:03 -0600 Received: from v15446.home.net.pl ([62.129.220.206]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from karol.pawlak@netcarshow.com) with smtp (Exim) id 1GtYF5-0000Ku-Hl for abuse@theplanet.com; Sun, 10 Dec 2006 17:37:59 -0600 Received: from chello087206115226.chello.pl (HELO xp.netcarshow.com) (karol.pawlak.netcarshow@home@87.206.115.226) by m060.home.net.pl with SMTP; Sun, 10 Dec 2006 23:37:56 -0000 Message-Id: <7.0.1.0.2.20061211003537.02293330@netcarshow.com> X-Mailer: QUALCOMM Windows Eudora Version 7.0.1.0 Date: Mon, 11 Dec 2006 00:37:59 +0100 To: abuse@theplanet.com From: Karol Pawlak Subject: Copyrights infraction Mime-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="=====================_13966282==.ALT" X-OriginalArrivalTime: 10 Dec 2006 23:38:03.0603 (UTC) FILETIME=[3C610230:01C71CB4] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) I would like to report numerous copyrights infractions at a site www.infocoches.com hosted at one of your servers (70.86.155.18). This site's owners notoriously steal and retag copyrighted materials from NetCarShow.com including the picture database ( i.e. as you can see by our tag in the bottom right corner of http://img.infocoches.com/img/peugeot/2007-207-CC/peugeot_2007-207-CC-011_2.jpg ) and a licensed JavaScript (used to preview galleries). The site contains 'Google Ads' and is design for commercial purposes and as such it is clearly braking the law by unauthorized, commercial use of copyrighted materials. Please take appropriate actions to force the site's owner to remove the content stolen from NetCarShow.com. Best Regards Karol Pawlak NetCarShow.com MIME element (text/html) I would like to report numerous copyrights infractions at a site www.infocoches.com hosted at one of your servers (70.86.155.18).
